DOC.brief_summary: This project aim : - explore effectiveness novel sonified Neurofeedback management therapy child diagnose Autism Spectrum Disorder ( ASD ) - determine balance control different therapy
DOC.brief_title: Neurofeedback Therapy Children Diagnosed With Autism
DOC.detailed_description: Once inform consent parent guardian secure , child ask provide informed assent . If child elect participate research project , he/she enrol study assign one two group : Active Comparator Sham Comparator . If possible , his/her ability maintain balance assess use standard extend mCTSIB protocol ( stand 25 second hard surface/4 '' tall foam cushion eye open/closed head neutral/turned right/left/flexed extend ) his/her baseline qEEG Galvanic Skin Response record . A series questionnaire administer child and/or his/her parents/legal guardian/caretaker . Afterward child instruct wear prescribed device ( either Active Comparator ( Mente Autism™ ) Sham Comparator ( device externally identical Mente Autism™ , provide binaural beat tailor-made neurofeedback binaural beat ) ) use home 40 minute day 12 week . After 6 week end 12 week treatment period , child test begin trial ( posturography , qEEG , Galvanic Skin Response questionnaires ) . At end study , participant Sham Comparator group offer option receive full therapy .
